Cypress.Department of Music at California State:
Ranked in the top 25 accredited university programs in the nation, the Music Department at Cal State Northridge is known for superior teaching provided by 70 distinguished faculty and professional musicians. Currently, there are more than 500 students pursuing undergraduate and graduate degrees in music.
CSUN’s music programs have been recognized internationally for the excellent preparation of students in a variety of careers in classical and commercial music.
